explanation: [0-0] The scene shows a white tabletop. A hand is pasting a yellow paper shark onto a blue ocean background paper. Several other colored paper sharks and a few small fish have already been pasted on the background paper. A row of shark plush toys in various colors are placed at the top of the table. Another hand is holding a glue stick.
[0-2] Next, the camera zooms in, focusing on the blue background paper, showing details of the paper sharks and small fish.
